fields.name: laowai_panda Reset password
fields.subject: Laowai Panda Reset Password
fields.message:
{{app_name}}

We have received a request to reset your password.
please use this code {{temp_code}} to reset your password

NOTE: this code will be valid for one successfully usage. If you didn't ask for resetting your password skip this mail you are still safe. NOTE: if you logged in using your old password, the above code will be invalid.

We received a report to question from user called '{{username}}' the reporter user email is: '{{email}}'
